Drink 8 glasses of water a day.
Healthy life, starting from drinking water
After a night of sleep, the body began to dry. drinking water after getting up, it can help kidney and liver detoxification.

Early morning from getting up to the company\'s process, the time is always particularly tight, emotional tension, the body will appear dehydration phenomenon, so arriving the office, first give yourself a glass of water.

Work after a period of time from the air conditioning room, must take advantage of the up move, give yourself a day of the third glass of water, added loss of moisture, help relax mood of intense work.
Drinking water before meals helps digestion and weight loss.
After lunch to drink some water, can strengthen the body\'s digestive function.
With a cup of water instead of Coffee or tea, Can be refreshing the mind.
Drink a cup of water after dinner to increasing satiety, when eating dinner, it will not overeat.
One to half an hour before going to bed，drinking a cup of water, then having a adequate intake of water. But don\'t drink too much at night, avioding taking a leak at night to affect sleep quality.
It is time to drink water.we shoule drink eight glasses of water every day.

The number of heartbeats per minute under normal resting state, usually 60 to 100 beats/min
Refer to the figure below for your exercise heart rate zone can help you for different training intensity to optimize workout

Measurement failed, please check the status of the device and try again

Please add the device before using this feature

Resting heart rate is one of the important indicators of heart health, which refers to the number of heart beats per minute in a conscious and inactive state. In general, the most accurate measure of the morning to get up the heart rate. \n\n resting heart rate with age, health status, according to the survey, the scope of Chinese male resting heart rate is 50~95 / min, 55~95 / min for women.

Fat exercise area is the heart rate in the exercise area *60% (220- age) to 70% within the scope of the exercise area in the region belong to the low strength, can play a very good role of body fat consumption, such as jogging, riding a bike.

Endurance exercise area is the heart rate in (220- age) *70% to 85% range of exercise area, the region belongs to the high intensity of the exercise area, can be very good to improve the heart endurance.

Super exercise area is greater than the heart rate (220- age) *85% range of exercise area, the region belongs to high-intensity exercise area, can improve the athletic performance, but does not help to lose weight, for example: race, weight lifting.

A：As the bracelet memory limit, hand ring can not be built-in Chinese font, so the hand ring can not handle Chinese characters, names and messages are not displayed. Our next-generation hand ring will be built-in Chinese font.

A：Connect the bracelet, enter the APP \"Mine\" - \"Device Settings\" - \"smart alarm clock\" can set the alarm clock on the hand ring. Set up, the Bluetooth does not have to connect, the ring can also ring the alarm clock.

A：If it is Andrews mobile phone. First APP link bracelet, APP \"Mine\" - \"Device Settings\" - \"message push\", open the message alert, and select the application to be reminded. If it is Apple phone. APP does not need to do any settings, to ensure that the corresponding application settings in the phone settings open, and the bracelet is properly connected, on it. If there is no reminder, it is recommended to enter the settings in the Bluetooth, find the bracelet, click the exclamation point, select Ignore the device, and then APP to re-link the bracelet. Pop-up matching box, be sure to select the pair.

A：You can leave feedback to the feedback, you can also go to the public in the message. But the public number of the message, can only be saved for two days, so if the public is not in time to get back, you can feedback in the feedback APP. Feedback information, try to leave more information: phone model, Andrews or iOS version number, firmware version number and so on.

A：OPPO R9Message notification can not be pushed, this phenomenon and the phone system, the old mobile phone system, there is no problem. Currently found there is a way, you can let the bracelet have a reminder.That is to open the phone\'s developer model. \nopen method is as follows:\nfirst enter the system on the phone, click on the \"version number\" menu, will prompt has entered the developer model, And then return to the settings, find the \"other settings\", enter the developer mode, and open the.

A：1. need to visit APP, and then from the APP \"Mine\" - \"WeChat campaign\" to enter, bind \"DroiHealth\" thepublic number. 2. Synchronize the movement data of the bracelet by APP. 3. If there is a cloud upload icon in the upper right corner of the home page, click this icon; if you do not have this icon, just in the APP\'s ranking page, drop-down refresh. So the number of steps to upload to the cloud, the number of steps can be synchronized to the WeChat movement.

A：Bluetooth is often disconnected, this is because Andrews system, will run against the background of the program to clean up, kill the larger memory applications. Mobile phone system in order to reduce power consumption, etc., will check the running background and occupation of memory, if the larger memory or power consumption, will force the closure of some applications. We recommend that you use the bracelet, you can not always open Bluetooth. (Because the connection is disconnected, APP will try to automatically return to the hand ring) when you need to use, and then open. Bluetooth mobile phone is closed, the bracelet can still remember step, monitoring sleep. Need to synchronize data, re-connect it. This can also save power consumption. If you want to stay connected for a long time, you need to lock the application, or join the white list and the like, to reduce the probability of APP killed by the system.

A：Settings, if you can search, we recommend that you open the phone gps, and then enter the APP to search for Bluetooth devices, try. If you can search to this time, you can turn off gps. At present Andrews 6.0 part of the model compatibility of this phenomenon.
A：QQ does not support healthy access, our engineers are seeking and QQ docking, hoping to achieve this functionality as soon as possible.
A：APP to connect the device, click the device, enter the view.
A：Go to APP, delete the device, and then search and connect the Bluetooth device again, and then perform the firmware upgrade again.
A：Only need to sleep with a hand ring at night, the next day to use APP link bracelet, synchronized about the data on it.
A：Time does not need to set, as long as the Bluetooth device and mobile phone APP connection, the Bluetooth device will automatically synchronize the phone\'s time.

* In order to be able to upload the steps, the user is bound device in Droihealth 1.0, please first cancel DroiHealth Official Accounts,then rebinding equipment.
BMI (Mass Index Body) index also known as the body mass index, is to assess the proportion of body weight and height reference index.\n formula: BMI= weight / height squared (㎏/㎡)
1. If you change your account number and you have previously noted the \"DroiHealth\" public number, you will need to cancel the \"DroiHealth\" public number first.
2. Into the APP, enter the \"Mine\" page, click the \"WeChat motion\" menu.
3. Jump to the \"DroiHealth\" WeChat public number, click the binding device. Make sure the following is bound.

4. Back to APP, into the APP\'s ranking page, drop-down refresh to ensure that the number of steps uploaded to the cloud. The content displayed on the ranking page is the same as the content in the cloud. \n5. At this time, you can look at the micro letter campaign, refresh the list, the number of steps have been synchronized.
友盟社会化组件（SDK）让移动应用快速整合社交分享功能，我们简化了社交平台的接入，为开发者提供坚实的基础服务。（一）支持各大主流社交平台， （二）支持图片、文字、gif动图、音频、视频；@好友，关注官方微博等功能。 （三）提供详尽的后台用户社交行为分析。www.umeng.com/social
